===Etymology===
Near-homophone of the profanity phrase {{zh-l|肏你媽|tr=cào nǐ mā|fuck your mother}} in Mandarin.

Individuals in Mainland China used {{lang|zh|草泥馬}}／{{lang|zh|草泥马}} instead of {{zh-l|肏你媽}} in order to avoid being detected by censors.
